name: Canceled Noise - A Secam Jam Game
name_original: Canceled Noise - A Secam Jam Game
description:
Canceled Noise is a game developed for the Secam Jam.

Snow Man is trying to cancel your show. Avoid him long enough to stay on air. To do so players must stay off of lit panels long enough to win. To move around use WASD:

W - move up

S - move down

D - move right

A - move left
